description:
Sawyer`s Slurpuff was revealed when it was sent out to find Sawyer lost battle notebook. Peroream`s sense of smell is said to be a 100 million times better than a human`s so it was used to sniff out where the battle notebook was located. It quickly found it and took it away from Rocket Gang.
Later on in the day, it faced Ash`s Hawlucha in a battle. It had Electro Ball prepared for dealing with Flying types but Ash`s Hawlucha dodged the attack and while trying to figure out what to do next, Ash`s Hawlucha knocked out Sawyer`s Slurpuff with Flying Press.
name: Peroream (Shouta)
